name: Karl
text: Hey that was a good round of golf today.

name: Kevin
text: Thanks! I'm just glad I was finally able to get out of the bunker in one stroke!

name: Karl
text: Not to mention, 10 feet away from the hole!

name: Kevin
text: Which I missed to make par

name: Karl
text: Eh it happens. Hey let's celebrate with some cinnamon roles!

name: Kevin
text: But this wasn't even a tournament...

name: Karl
text: So you don't want a cinnamon role?

name: Kevin
text: Oh not at all! Let's eat!

name: Narrator
text: You hop on your golf cart to get some cinnamon roles
